channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Special counsel's final report says Trump would have been convicted
item.description: The fast-moving legal battle over the release of the special counsel's final report played out days before Trump's second-term inauguration.

item.title: 153 winners of Nobel and World Food prizes seek new ways to grow food to meet surging global need
Strong winds forecast for Los Angeles threaten area’s fight against fires
item.description: A growing force of firefighters and equipment has moved into the Los Angeles area. Another round of powerful winds is threatening to trigger new wildf...

item.title: Trump's pick for secretary of defense is Pete Hegseth. Here's what to know
item.description: Pete Hegseth, President-elect Donald Trump's pick to run the Department of Defense, will answer questions Tuesday in a public hearing before the Senat...

item.title: What would happen to TikTok on my phone if the app is banned?
item.description: A law that could ban TikTok in the U.S. is set to take effect on Jan. 19. Here's what that would mean for users of the social media platform.

item.title: Multiracial boom in 2020 census was mostly an illusion, researchers say
Five takeaways from Smith's report on Trump's 2020 election case
item.description: Trump is accused of inspiring Jan 6 violence but prosecutors thought an incitement charge would be too risky.

item.title: Biden announces aircraft carriers will be named for Clinton, Bush
item.description: The latest line of U.S. carriers is named for Gerald R. Ford, and another of the multi-billion-dollar ships bears John F. Kennedy's name.

item.title: Voters backed abortion rights, but the state judges they elected might not
item.description: Though abortion rights supporters prevailed on ballot measures in seven of the 10 states where abortion was up for a vote on Nov. 5, the state supreme...

item.title: A tortoise survival tale: How Tiptoe escaped Southern California's wildfires
item.description: For years, Tiptoe has been a beloved sight in Pacific Palisades, quietly tromping along sidewalks and growing a major social media following. But last...

item.title: Spain plans 100% tax for homes bought by non-EU residents
item.description: The measure is meant to help tackle the country's housing crisis, the prime minister said.

item.title: A new fire breaks out in Southern California as high winds threaten progress
item.description: The Auto Fire adds to a string of deadly fires that authorities are still working to contain in Southern California.

item.title: LA brain surgeon saves street from 'apocalyptic' wildfires
item.description: Chester Griffiths says the ferocity of the flames demonstrates the need for residents to be prepared.

item.title: 'The New York Times' takes OpenAI to court. ChatGPT's future could be on the line
item.description: In three consolidated suits, publishers allege that OpenAI broke copyright law by copying millions of articles without permission or payment. OpenAI c...

item.title: This skateboarding economist suggests we need more skateparks and less capitalism
item.description: A skateboarder presented an unusual paper at this year's big meeting of American economists.

item.title: Trump would have been convicted if not elected, DoJ report says
item.description: A prosecutor says there was enough evidence in the 2020 US election case - but he was scuppered by Trump's win in 2024.

item.title: Rescuers pull six more bodies from South Africa mine
item.description: Hundreds of people have reportedly been underground since a crackdown on illegal mining began last year.

item.title: Video captures moment coyote pulled from West Side grocery store refrigerator
item.description: Customers could be heard gasping as officers made several attempts to yank the coyote out of the shelf—finally pulling the animal out by its tail.
